languages.text: Множество соглашений привязали Имперский флот к династии фон Валанциус. Капитаны охотно патрулировали протекторат, зная, что получат щедрое поощрение. Корабли конкурентов гибли от "пиратских атак" и подвергались суровым досмотрам. Многие офицеры негласно переходили на службу династии, получая жалование и титул в обмен на отменные навыки. Достойные адмиралы, на чьих мундирах прибавилось золота, ценили новых друзей.

A multitude of agreements bound the Imperial Navy to the von Valancius dynasty. Captains were eager to patrol the protectorate, knowing they would be richly rewarded. Competing ships were lost to "pirate attacks" and subjected to harsh inspections. Many officers quietly entered the dynasty's service, receiving a salary and title in exchange for their excellent skills. Worthy admirals valued their new friends and enjoyed more gold on their uniforms.
languages.original_text: Множество соглашений привязали Имперский флот к династии фон Валанциус. Капитаны охотно патрулировали протекторат, зная, что получат щедрое поощрение. Корабли конкурентов гибли от "пиратских атак" и подвергались суровым досмотрам. Многие офицеры негласно переходили на службу династии, получая жалование и титул в обмен на отменные навыки. Достойные адмиралы, на чьих мундирах прибавилось золота, ценили новых друзей.

languages.text: 根据冯·瓦兰修斯王朝与帝国海军之间签订的诸多协议，王朝与帝国海军展开了密切的合作关系。所有舰长都希望能在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的领地进行巡逻，因为这么做会得到丰厚的回报。冯·瓦兰修斯家族竞争对手的舰船要么遭到了严格盘查，要么遭到“海盗袭击”。帝国海军许多军官都悄悄加入了王朝，成为了正式成员，以出色的技术换取高额的薪水与尊崇的头衔。尊敬的海军上将很重视他们的新朋友，也很喜欢口袋里额外的金子。
languages.original_text: A multitude of agreements bound the Imperial Navy to the von Valancius dynasty. Captains were eager to patrol the protectorate, knowing they would be richly rewarded. Competing ships were lost to "pirate attacks" and subjected to harsh inspections. Many officers quietly entered the dynasty's service, receiving a salary and title in exchange for their excellent skills. Worthy admirals valued their new friends and enjoyed more gold on their uniforms.

traits.locale_text: 根据冯·瓦兰修斯王朝与帝国海军之间签订的诸多协议，王朝与帝国海军展开了密切的合作关系。所有舰长都希望能在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的领地进行巡逻，因为这么做会得到丰厚的回报。冯·瓦兰修斯家族竞争对手的舰船要么遭到了严格盘查，要么遭到“海盗袭击”。帝国海军许多军官都悄悄加入了王朝，成为了正式成员，以出色的技术换取高额的薪水与尊崇的头衔。尊敬的海军上将很重视他们的新朋友，也很喜欢口袋里额外的金子。

languages.text: 多くの契約が帝国海軍とフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝を結びつけた。中隊長達は豪勢な褒賞を受けられると知っていたため、保護領をパトロールしたがった。競合船は「海賊の奇襲」に敗れ、厳しい調査を受けた。多くの役人がこっそりと王朝へ仕えるようになり、その優れた技量と引き換えに給料と役職を授与されていた。お偉方の司令官達は新しい友人を重んじ、彼らの制服の装飾は日に日に豪華になっていった。
languages.original_text: A multitude of agreements bound the Imperial Navy to the von Valancius dynasty. Captains were eager to patrol the protectorate, knowing they would be richly rewarded. Competing ships were lost to "pirate attacks" and subjected to harsh inspections. Many officers quietly entered the dynasty's service, receiving a salary and title in exchange for their excellent skills. Worthy admirals valued their new friends and enjoyed more gold on their uniforms.

traits.locale_text: 多くの契約が帝国海軍とフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝を結びつけた。中隊長達は豪勢な褒賞を受けられると知っていたため、保護領をパトロールしたがった。競合船は「海賊の奇襲」に敗れ、厳しい調査を受けた。多くの役人がこっそりと王朝へ仕えるようになり、その優れた技量と引き換えに給料と役職を授与されていた。お偉方の司令官達は新しい友人を重んじ、彼らの制服の装飾は日に日に豪華になっていった。

languages.text: Une multitude d'accords lia la Marine Impériale à la dynastie von Valancius. Les capitaines avaient hâte de patrouiller dans le protectorat, en sachant qu'ils seraient richement récompensés. Des vaisseaux concurrents tombèrent dans des « attaques de pirates » et furent soumis à de rudes inspections. Beaucoup d'officiers entrèrent discrètement au service de la dynastie, recevant ainsi un salaire et un titre en échange de leurs excellentes compétences. Des amiraux méritants reconnurent la valeur de leurs nouveaux amis et purent ajouter des galons à leurs uniformes.
languages.original_text: A multitude of agreements bound the Imperial Navy to the von Valancius dynasty. Captains were eager to patrol the protectorate, knowing they would be richly rewarded. Competing ships were lost to "pirate attacks" and subjected to harsh inspections. Many officers quietly entered the dynasty's service, receiving a salary and title in exchange for their excellent skills. Worthy admirals valued their new friends and enjoyed more gold on their uniforms.

traits.locale_text: Une multitude d'accords lia la Marine Impériale à la dynastie von Valancius. Les capitaines avaient hâte de patrouiller dans le protectorat, en sachant qu'ils seraient richement récompensés. Des vaisseaux concurrents tombèrent dans des « attaques de pirates » et furent soumis à de rudes inspections. Beaucoup d'officiers entrèrent discrètement au service de la dynastie, recevant ainsi un salaire et un titre en échange de leurs excellentes compétences. Des amiraux méritants reconnurent la valeur de leurs nouveaux amis et purent ajouter des galons à leurs uniformes.

languages.text: Una multitud de acuerdos vinculó a la Armada Imperial con la dinastía von Valancius. Los capitanes estaban deseando patrullar el protectorado, conscientes de que recibirían una generosa recompensa. Las naves que pretendían arrebatarles el honor caían víctimas de «ataques piratas» o se las sometía a rigurosas inspecciones. Muchos oficiales entraron discretamente al servicio de la dinastía, obteniendo un salario y un título a cambio de sus excelentes habilidades. Los almirantes dignos del honor apreciaban a sus nuevos amigos y disfrutaron de las nuevas decoraciones de oro en sus uniformes.
languages.original_text: A multitude of agreements bound the Imperial Navy to the von Valancius dynasty. Captains were eager to patrol the protectorate, knowing they would be richly rewarded. Competing ships were lost to "pirate attacks" and subjected to harsh inspections. Many officers quietly entered the dynasty's service, receiving a salary and title in exchange for their excellent skills. Worthy admirals valued their new friends and enjoyed more gold on their uniforms.

traits.locale_text: Una multitud de acuerdos vinculó a la Armada Imperial con la dinastía von Valancius. Los capitanes estaban deseando patrullar el protectorado, conscientes de que recibirían una generosa recompensa. Las naves que pretendían arrebatarles el honor caían víctimas de «ataques piratas» o se las sometía a rigurosas inspecciones. Muchos oficiales entraron discretamente al servicio de la dinastía, obteniendo un salario y un título a cambio de sus excelentes habilidades. Los almirantes dignos del honor apreciaban a sus nuevos amigos y disfrutaron de las nuevas decoraciones de oro en sus uniformes.

languages.text: Zahlreiche Vereinbarungen banden die Imperiale Kriegsflotte an die Dynastie von Valancius. Captains patrouillierten gerne im Protektorat, weil sie wussten, dass sie reich belohnt wurden. Konkurrierende Schiffe fielen "Piratenüberfällen" zum Opfer oder wurden strengen Inspektionen unterzogen. Viele Offiziere traten unauffällig in die Dienste der Dynastie und erhielten für ihre ausgezeichneten Fähigkeiten Lohn und Titel. Würdige Admiräle schätzten ihre neuen Freunde und freuten sich über noch mehr Gold an ihren Uniformen.
languages.original_text: A multitude of agreements bound the Imperial Navy to the von Valancius dynasty. Captains were eager to patrol the protectorate, knowing they would be richly rewarded. Competing ships were lost to "pirate attacks" and subjected to harsh inspections. Many officers quietly entered the dynasty's service, receiving a salary and title in exchange for their excellent skills. Worthy admirals valued their new friends and enjoyed more gold on their uniforms.

Captains patrouillierten gerne im Protektorat, weil sie wussten, dass sie reich belohnt wurden. Konkurrierende Schiffe fielen "Piratenüberfällen" zum Opfer oder wurden strengen Inspektionen unterzogen. Viele Offiziere traten unauffällig in die Dienste der Dynastie und erhielten für ihre ausgezeichneten Fähigkeiten Lohn und Titel. Würdige Admiräle schätzten ihre neuen Freunde und freuten sich über noch mehr Gold an ihren Uniformen.

languages.text: İmparatorluk Donanması, çok sayıda anlaşmayla von Valancius hanedanlığına bağlandı. Cömertçe ödüllendirileceklerini bilen kaptanlar, protektorada devriyeye çıkmak konusunda son derece istekliydi. O sırada rakip gemiler, "korsan saldırılarına" kurban gidip sert denetimlere maruz kalıyordu. Birçok subay; hanedanlığın hizmetinde sessiz sedasız çalışmaya, üstün meziyetleri karşılığında maaş ve rütbe almaya başladılar. Üst düzey amiraller, yeni dostlarının değerini bilip üniformalarını daha da çok altınla donattı.
languages.original_text: A multitude of agreements bound the Imperial Navy to the von Valancius dynasty. Captains were eager to patrol the protectorate, knowing they would be richly rewarded. Competing ships were lost to "pirate attacks" and subjected to harsh inspections. Many officers quietly entered the dynasty's service, receiving a salary and title in exchange for their excellent skills. Worthy admirals valued their new friends and enjoyed more gold on their uniforms.

traits.locale_text: İmparatorluk Donanması, çok sayıda anlaşmayla von Valancius hanedanlığına bağlandı. Kaptanlar protektorada devriyeye çıkmak konusunda son derece istekliydi, cömertçe ödüllendirileceklerini biliyorlardı. Rakip gemiler "korsan saldırılarına" kurban gitti ve sert denetimlere maruz kaldı. Birçok subay sessiz sedasız hanedanlığın hizmetinde çalışmaya, üstün meziyetleri karşılığında maaş ve rütbe almaya başladılar. Üst düzey amiraller yeni dostlarının değerini bildi ve üniformalarını daha da çok altınla doldurdu.
